levelDescription: With the torch in hand, you can make out the end of the hallway in front of you.
What are you doing back here, this is certainly not the right way.
You can make out that the sobbing is coming from your right.
The sobbing returns, you can make out that it's coming from your right.
The sobbing returns, you can make out that it's coming from behind you.
The sobbing increases, you can hear it in both your ears.
As you walk forwards the sobbing increases. You walk up to a closed metal gate, to your right is a damp room.
In the room there's a keyhole on the opposite side of the gate.
